and.pcdata: Products with electrical plugs are designed for use in the US. Outlets and voltage differ internationally and this product may require an adapter or converter for use in your destination. Please check compatibility before purchasing.
\n How customer reviews and ratings work\n
\n Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.\n

\n To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don\xe2\x80\x99t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.\n
\n Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon\n

variant.label: _K2_
variant.pcdata: \n I bought this TV to replace a smaller 20 year old Sony. It is used in the kitchen.Nice picture (coming from a 720p resolution 20 year old Sony). Nice feature set in terms of being \'smart\'. I was able to modify an adjustable height monitor stand that I already had so I could mount the new set. As you can see, my kitchen cabinets limited my overall height. I was able to mount the new sound bar underneath the tv and made a nice compact package. Make sure you buy a set with the inputs and outputs you need. There are many choices and the more features there are, the higher the price. This was fine for what I needed.\n
